sentences.sentence: They seemed to be resentful of our presence there.
sentences.translation: 他们好像对我们在那里露面很生气。

sentences.sentence: She was resentful at having been left out of the team.
sentences.translation: 她对被运动队淘汰感到气愤。

sentences.sentence: At first I felt very resentful and angry about losing my job.
sentences.translation: 起初,我对丢掉工作感到非常怨恨和恼怒。
